FuncDef: The display ntp-service sessions verbose command displays information about local Network Time Protocol (NTP) sessions.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays detailed information about NTP sessions. If verbose is not specified in this command, summary information on NTP sessions is displayed.
-

Examples: clock status: configured, master, sane, valid
local mode: client, local poll: 2, current poll: 2
peer mode: server, peer poll: 2, now: 0
offset: 0.0000 ms, delay: 0.00 ms, disper: 0.08 ms
root delay: 0.00 ms, root disper: 10.00 ms
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command displays information about local Network Time Protocol (NTP) sessions.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
